channel.title: Windows xp
channel.description: ok so hey guys, im running on the shittiest thing ever, windows XP.. its so damn slow! any one knoow how to improve its speed?

item.title: Windows xp
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Lol i bet your computer isnt slow because of windows, i bet its slow because of all the shit youve loaded it down with, go look in your msconfig and disable everything except essential windows components and i bet itll startup and run a bit faster

Read full topic

item.title: Windows xp
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:31, topic:415975”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=517920.msg3770770#msg3770770 date=1317670007]

I liked XP… don’t call it shit

^

Also if your computer is running slow with xp you need a new computer, not a new OS.
[/quote]

What if you completely remove all operating systems and install windows xp and it’s still kind of slow and unusable when you open runescape? Would I need more RAM or something?[/quote]
You would need more ram and a better processor.

Read full topic

I have a computer that has I think 64MB of RAM. It’s a Macintosh from '95… lol

I also have 3 computers with 2GB and 1 with 4GB. Nothing over 4GB sadly… I plan on buying 2 4GB RAM sticks. I think you should, too.

item.description:

[quote=“xmonster, post:9, topic:415975”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=517920.msg3762767#msg3762767 date=1316992777]

XP is awesome, It is not shit.

XP is awesome but it still has a lot of downfalls. I haven’t had problems from Windows 7 or Linux.

You’ve never had problems with Linux!? Lucky little boy.

Of course I have but not as much as I’ve had with XP.
[/quote]
dont get me wrong i like xp too… its very easy to code on xp… but its just its very slow and i cant run many servers for example, torvapkz…[/quote]
